mapper.select: SELECT AC_TYPE, AC_DATE, JV_NO, JV_TITLE, JV_ADDRESS, M_NAME, S_NAME, EL_NAME, TO_CHAR(AC_DATE,'YYYY.MM.dd') AC_DATE_FORMAT FROM APPLY_COMPANY AC JOIN JOB_VACANCY JV USING(JV_NO) JOIN COMPANY_INFO CI USING(CI_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (CI.M_NO = M.M_NO) JOIN RECRUITMENT_INDUSTRY RI USING(JV_NO) JOIN SECTOR S ON(S.S_NO = RI.S_NO) JOIN JOB_VACANCY_EXPERIENCE_LEVEL JVEL USING(JV_NO) JOIN EXPERIENCE_LEVEL EL ON(EL.EL_NO = JVEL.EL_NO) WHERE AC.M_NO=#{no} ORDER BY AC_DATE

SELECT AC_TYPE, AC_DATE, JV_NO, JV_TITLE, JV_ADDRESS, M_NAME, S_NAME, EL_NAME, TO_CHAR(AC_DATE,'YYYY.MM.dd') AC_DATE_FORMAT FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , NLIST.* FROM( SELECT * FROM APPLY_COMPANY AC JOIN JOB_VACANCY JV USING(JV_NO) JOIN COMPANY_INFO CI USING(CI_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (CI.M_NO = M.M_NO) JOIN RECRUITMENT_INDUSTRY RI USING(JV_NO) JOIN SECTOR S ON(S.S_NO = RI.S_NO) JOIN JOB_VACANCY_EXPERIENCE_LEVEL JVEL USING(JV_NO) JOIN EXPERIENCE_LEVEL EL ON(EL.EL_NO = JVEL.EL_NO) WHERE AC.M_NO=#{userNo} ORDER BY AC_DATE DESC) NLIST) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN (#{page}-1)*(#{boardLimit})+1 AND ((#{page}-1)*(#{boardLimit})+1)+(#{boardLimit}-1)
SELECT TO_CHAR(RB_DATE,'YYYY.MM.dd') RB_DATE_FORMAT FROM JOB_VACANCY JOIN COMPANY_INFO USING(CI_NO) JOIN RESUME_BROWSE USING(CI_NO) WHERE JV_NO=#{jvNo} AND RB_BROWSE = 'application'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPLY_COMPANY WHERE M_NO=#{no} AND AC_TYPE = 'apply'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPLY_COMPANY WHERE M_NO=#{no} AND AC_TYPE = 'pass'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPLY_COMPANY WHERE M_NO=#{no} AND AC_TYPE = 'interview'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPLY_COMPANY WHERE M_NO=#{no} AND AC_TYPE = 'passAll'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPLY_COMPANY WHERE M_NO=#{no} AND AC_TYPE = 'failure'
